author: Reuters
description: As this weekend approached, the question lingered if Alien: Covenant could unseat Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 in the domestic box office.
title: ‘Alien: Covenant’ Slips Past ‘Guardians 2’ to Win Box Office With $36 Million
